curriculum_overview.title: Shona Language Learning Curriculum
curriculum_overview.description: A comprehensive 4-level curriculum from beginner to advanced conversational fluency
curriculum_overview.pedagogical_approach: Communicative Language Teaching (CLT) + Task-Based Language Learning (TBLL) + Gamification

level_2.title: Kukura (The Explorer)
level_2.subtitle: The Contender - CEFR B1
level_2.objective: Build narrative and descriptive skills with 3,000-5,000 word vocabulary

level_3.title: Kutaura (The Communicator)
level_3.subtitle: The Conversationalist - CEFR B2
level_3.objective: Engage with authentic materials and communicate with nuance

level_4.title: Uchenjeri (The Orator)
level_4.subtitle: The Master - CEFR C1
level_4.objective: Achieve effective operational proficiency with cultural mastery
